com.vividsolutions.jcs.conflate.roads.attribute
Class TextHandler

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.vividsolutions.jcs.conflate.roads.attribute.TextHandler
public class TextHandler
extends java.lang.Object

Provides basic text Regular Expression functionality
 
  all these functions are static

 match( in, word)  - returns true if word is a word in 'in'
 remove(in,word)   - returns a new string with word removed from 'in'
 trimWhite(in)    -  removes white space from start and end of in and
                     converts double spaces to single spaces.

Constructor Summary

          Creates new TextHandler
 
Method Summary
static boolean match(java.lang.String in, java.lang.String word)
           match("niagara street","street") returns true word is only matched if at the start or end of the string or bounded by spaces ie.
static java.lang.String remove(java.lang.String in, java.lang.String word)
          remove ("niagara street","street") - > "niagara" you should trimWhite() after this
static java.lang.String trimWhite(java.lang.String in)
          remove extra spaces

Method Detail

match

public static boolean match(java.lang.String in,
                            java.lang.String word)
 match("niagara street","street") returns true
     word is only matched if at the start or end of the string or bounded by spaces
     ie.  "^word$" , "^word ", " word$", " word "
Parameters:
in - text to look at
word - word to match
